text:
Qbix Inc. http://qbix.com | remote | independent partners | non-traditional

Looking for: PHP, MySQL, JS, Node.js, HTML/CSS, PhoneGap, Visual Design and UX

First time posting here. This is an experiment.

We built an open source platform like Facebook, but decentralized, that lets developers build apps which communities will install. What Wordpress did for blogs, Qbix Platform does for social.

We're not fans of full-time employment, especially not on-site. We prefer to work in a decentralized manner, relying on our tools and systems (version control, project tracker, email, etc.) to get things done. Our motto is "People live lives. Companies create products."

So we are not hiring anyone for full-time work. It is more of a super-accelerator, with 90% done for you. Instead of selling your time for money in order to build value for a corporation, we will set you up with your own company for your project. You will own 15% of the company, with Qbix and other team members owning the rest.

With this structure, you do not have to be a US citizen. You will be a part owner in a joint venture. You would be in charge of working with your team and making decisions together. The companh would pay salaries to the team, and you would have 15% of any dividends or disbursements.

For more information, visit http://qbix.com/platform and shoot us an email.
